text: William Earl "Bill" White (August 26, 1939 â€“ May 21, 2017) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player and coach. White was one of the most notable defensive defense men of the 1970s. He was born in Toronto, Ontario. He played for the Rochester Americans and the Springfield Indians in the AHL. He played in the NHL for the Los Angeles Kings and the Chicago Black Hawks. White died on May 21, 2017 in Toronto, Ontario from natural causes at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Los Angeles Kings players Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Rochester Americans players Category:Ice hockey people from Toronto Category:Springfield Indians players
title: Bill White (ice hockey)
